name: Easter at GallMart
description:
SPRING HAS SPRUNG!

GallMart is hosting an Easter egg hunt this year! 

First kid to find 8 Easter eggs wins the grand prize!

 An Easter bunny mascot is greeting customers as they come in as part of the festivities!

Although, that mascot is a bit creepy... Why does it keep looking at me...

REVIEWS

"Hands down the biggest scream of our life" -Fattmat

"ALMOST MADE ME BREAK MY HEADPHONES!!" -TryShock

Submission for the #harvestmousejam
